title: Novak Djokovic's Big Tennis Dream
summary: Novak Djokovic is a famous tennis player who wants to win his 25th Grand Slam title, which is a big tournament in tennis. He is 38 years old and already has 24 wins, tying with another player named Margaret Court. He is playing in the Australian Open, a tournament in Melbourne where he has won 10 times before. Djokovic says he does not feel it is 'now or never' to win the 25th title; he tries to stay calm and focus on what he has already achieved. He will play against Pedro Martinez in his first match. Djokovic hopes to win but is happy with his career so far.

background_read: Tennis is a sport where players hit a ball over a net. Grand Slams are the biggest tournaments, including the Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, and US Open. Novak Djokovic is one of the best players ever, known for winning many titles. He is from Serbia and has been playing for many years. The Australian Open happens in January in Melbourne, Australia, and Djokovic has won it many times, making it a special place for him.
